name: Logging in
description: Input login details
Click 'Log in'
Click 'Researcher'

name: Main screen
description: This is the main screen
Well labelled main page of interest is 'My Studies'
You can also confirm timings of participants under 'Upcoming Appointments'

name: My Studies
description: The initial screen is for 'Active' surveys only
The active study is called *2.5 credits* Mood, Concentration and Problem solving
A second study is also used to grant credits for part 1 only which is under 'Inactive' surveys

name: Adding timeslots
description: You can add individual slots using the 'Add A Timeslot' button
You can also add multiple slots at once using the 'Add Multiple Timeslots' (see next page)
There are also buttons to delete slots if you make a mistake
Be careful with this there is nothing to stop you creating duplicate slots at the same time

name: Adding multiple timeslots
description: Clicking 'Add Multiple Timeslots' brings you to this screen
If you are testing at the same times each week, there is a useful option to copy timeslots from week to week
There is a screen to confirm you are happy with the times before adding them

name: Timeslot information
description: Clicking on an individual timeslot brings you to this screen
Most signups the participant signs themselves up although sometimes they may want to re-arrange
You can manually sign a person up on this screen by adding either their username (uni email) or name

name: Granting credits
description: Clicking 'View your uncredited timeslots' brings you a list of participants
Your options here are to grant credits (2.5) or to report no-shows
You also have the 'Mark all 'Participated'' option for granting credits to multiple participants
Ensure you click 'Process changes' to save
To grant 0.5 credits to participants who have completed just part 1, see separate tutorial
